objectDesc.p: Papyrus, 20.8x23, 1 extant leaf(s), 3 column(s), 26 line(s) per column, 20-26 characters per line, written in Greek.

additions.p: Single unrelated verse at the beginning of the 2nd column.

history.provenance: Purchased 1897 by Bernard Grenfell and Arthur Hunt at Miṣr.
Transferred to Lord Amherst of Hackney at Norfolk, England.
Transferred to Morgan Library and Museum at New York, NY.

msIdentifier.msName: S. L. 4687.1 Ro [2] & Vo, Morgan Library and Museum, New York, NY.

sourceDesc.bibl: Grenfell, Bernard P. and Arthur S. Hunt, The Amherst Papyri being an account of the Greek papyri in the collection of Lord Amherst of Hackney, Didlington Hall, Norfolk, no. 3, p. 30-31, Henry Frowde: London, England, 1900. OCLC 64368476.
